info.title: Core Ledger API
info.description: Financial Ledger REST API for institutional financial clients

get.summary: Verifica se um CNPJ está disponível para cadastro de novo fundo.

post.summary: Cria um novo fundo via wizard com todas as entidades relacionadas.

Receives notification from Worker that a transaction has been processed.
Broadcasts to the user who created the transaction via SignalR.
post.description: Receives transaction processing completion notifications from the Worker service

transactionId.description: The ID of the processed transaction.

createdByUserId.description: User ID of the person who created the transaction (may be null for batch operations).

CoreLedger.API.Endpoints.TransactionProc.description: Notification payload sent by Worker after processing a transaction.

Bearer.description:
JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your token in the text input below.

Example: "Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..."
